about_the_game:
Embark on a journey as Narak, a gun for hire, who after failing to stop a catastrophic event, is on a quest for redemption and to fight for his ultimate freedom.

Features

Hand-drawn Animations - Each and every single animation in Ghost Yantra is hand-drawn sprite-based animation, crafted with immense attention to the detail.

2D Hack-n-Slash Combat - Dive yourself into stylish-combat where all the animations are beautifully hand-crafted and hand-drawn. Make use of different weapons in encounters to destroy your enemies.

Parkour Platforming - Traverse your way through the city filled with dangerous obstacles. Make use of Parkour moves available in your move set. Run, Jump, Wall Jump, Roll, Run along the Wall, Grapple and more.

Manga inspired Cutscenes - Unravel the story of Narak in Ghost Yantra. Visually represented in fully hand crafted manga like cutscenes.

Welcome to Indian Cyberpunk - Discover a never seen before visually fresh & unique setting of an Indian Cyberpunk city. When Indian cultural & modern iconography and motifs fuses with Cyberpunk, that's how Indian Cyberpunk aesthetic is born.
